title: Ralph TUI - AI Agent Loop Orchestrator
description:
Terminal UI and execution engine for orchestrating AI agent loops. Replaces shell scripts (ralph.sh, ralph-beads.sh) with a proper TUI application.

## Goals
- Real-time observability into agent iterations and task progress
- Support pause/resume and graceful interruption
- Plugin architecture for agent providers (claude, opencode)
- Plugin architecture for issue trackers (json, beads, beads+bv)
- Session persistence to resume interrupted runs
- npm installable: `npm install -g ralph-tui`

## Tech Stack
- TypeScript + OpenTUI (React reconciler with Zig-powered rendering)

description:
As a developer, I want to set up the ralph-tui repository with proper TypeScript/OpenTUI structure so I can start development.

## Acceptance Criteria

- Install Zig (required by OpenTUI) or document requirement
- Set up directory structure: src/, src/commands/, src/tui/, src/plugins/agents/, src/plugins/trackers/
- Add tsconfig.json with proper config
- Add build scripts in package.json
- pnpm build succeeds
- pnpm typecheck passes
- pnpm lint passes

- Respect max iterations limit

- Save iteration output to file after each iteration
